channel.title: [delta] [317] tokkul shop help :(
channel.description: i was wondering if there would be a snippet or something to make the shop then i could edit in the items in the shop (: help?

item.title: [delta] [317] tokkul shop help :(
item.dc:creator: @Intimidation Intimidation
item.description:
@Intimidation wrote:

I’ll give you the codes to one of my shops, just change it to the stuff you want;

This will be in the file ‘shops’ or you may have a different name to it, it’ll still have shops in the title:

The codes above starting from 542 and so on are the items, keep the “2’s” there and change the number 4 to the last number, if your shops go upto 125 put it as 126.

Right, next go into the ‘autospawn’ file:

the 562 is the npc code, change it to the one you want, the next numbers are the coords of where he will stand, the next ones are if you want the npc to walk.

Last step, go into the client.java file in your source/server folder press Ctrl+F and search ‘wanneshop’ until you see something like this:

} else if (NPCID == 562) { // Brian PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 4; // PK Shop

Again the 562 is the npc code, change it to the one you want, the name Brian is the name of the Npc (this which not actually change the name but I write it so it’s easy to search). The ‘wanneshop=4’ is the shop number in your server, make sure the number is the same as your other one in the “shop’s” file as I put it as 126.

That’s pretty much it… hope I helped.

Read full topic
